title: Moscow increases security levels amid regional tensions
description: The Kremlin has announced new measures for infrastructure protection following recent events.

title: The Russian village that lost its men to war
description: Local reports indicate heavy losses in the border regions during recent military operations.

description: Kyiv reports heavy defensive battles as tactical maneuvers continue on both sides.

title: US Cyber Command issues high-level alert over infrastructure
description: Washington warns of coordinated cyber attacks targeting the national power grid.

description: Over 20 naval vessels identified in the latest large-scale maritime exercise.

title: Japan Coast Guard on high alert after missile debris falls
description: Maritime safety warnings issued for all vessels in the Sea of Japan.
